titles: A learned sermon handling the question of ceremonies, controuerted in our church: by Roger Hacket Doctor in Diuinitie
author: Hacket, Roger, 1559-1621.
publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston, for Cuthbert Burbie, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Swan in Pauls Churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
